really enjoyable game it does not hold your hand i had many wtf am i supposed to do moments but try not to look anything up because it feels great to figure it out on your own   the game is quite short 56 hours for most people but lacks much replayability i would not buy this game for full price but it goes on a deep sale every seasonal sale  i parallel played through it with my friend which was fun to see how we each approaches the same puzzles
